channel.title: Client Loading Problem
channel.description:
The client loads fine for me but for someone who is trying to play they have JDK installed and I think their variables are okay.
Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: Jframe Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: Jframe at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(URLClassLoader.java:202) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(URLClassLoader.java:190) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:307) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Launcher.java:301) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:248) Could not find the main class: Jframe. Program will exit. Press any key to continue . . .
EDIT: Thanks for moving tom

item.title: Client Loading Problem
item.dc:creator: @marcbob marcbob
item.description:
@marcbob wrote:

The client loads fine for me but for someone who is trying to play they have JDK installed and I think their variables are okay.

Exception in thread “main” java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: Jframe
Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: Jframe
at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(URLClassLoader.java:202)
at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method)
at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(URLClassLoader.java:190)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:307)
at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Launcher.java:301)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:248)
Could not find the main class: Jframe. Program will exit.
Press any key to continue . . .

EDIT: Thanks for moving tom
